about_the_game:
Hentai Puzzle Party behind a collection of puzzles with several beautiful girls and well-worked environment.

- 15 beautiful pictures of sexy girls.
- See when you want the images after completing the puzzle.
- Good ambient music.
- 25 Steam Achievements (Coming Soon)

** More images will be inserted later in future updates. **

This is not a pseudo game just to farm (spam) achievements, there is a mechanic in it, stay tuned and use your head to complete the puzzle!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult material, such as nudity, sexual content, intended only for those over 18 years of age. It is not intended for minors.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 1 GB (with Pixel Shader support)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Hentai Puzzle Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB (with Pixel Shader support)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
